Description: This guitar has the best playing neck on a strat type guitar that I've played. Lightweight body, sounds great. It's truly a wonderful instrument and a joy to play. The same guitar new is selling for $3200 on Reverb (and it's worth it!!!) This one has the 9.5 inch radius neck which is very comfortable to play and bend strings. The older versions had the 7.5 inch radius necks. It's in excellent condition. The Carl Verheyen guitar comes lightly relic'd (see photos) just the right amount of relic. A lightweight solid alder body with a maple neck and rosewood fingerboard. The LsL Carl Verheyen Special solidbody electric guitar is crafted to be the ultimate instrument for Supertramp guitarist Carl Verheyen, who also happens to be one of the most prolific session guitarists in the world. Just about every piece of this machine is crafted in-house at LsL by a small group of luthiers, with a fine-tuned attention to detail and quality. LsL CV Special Features:• CV Blue finish• Nitrocellulose lacquer• Alder body• Maple neck• Rosewood fretboard• 22 frets• Custom LsL pickguard• 25.5" scale• 9.5" fingerboard radius• LsL 50's Saticoy pickups pickups• 5 way switch• 1Vol, 2 Tones• 7 lbs. 6 oz.• Original hard case
Title: 2016 LSL Carl Verheyen Guitar
